articles.author: Skyler Ware
articles.title: Scientists uncover 'inside-out, legless, headless wonder' that lived long before the dinosaurs - Livescience.com
articles.description: Fossils of 444 million-year-old creatures whose bodies were preserved "inside-out" have been discovered in South Africa.
articles.content: Scientists have found two specimens of a 444 million-year-old "inside-out" fossil with well-preserved soft tissue, according to a new study. Unlike most fossils, the creature's muscles and guts — but… [+3829 chars]
